attributes.title: Killed my unicorn
attributes.review: The app sent the FBI to kill my unicorn. Smh why would anyone do that 😭😭😭 (Came from TikTok us Gen Zs aren’t going down without a fight!!!!)

attributes.title: Make The App Store Great Again :/
attributes.review: This app made me stop supporting Trump. After downloading and using this app, I became a socialist pro-choice blue-haired liberal with homosexual tendencies. 1 star.

attributes.title: OH CHETTO PUFFS
attributes.review: This app is atrocious! It freezes my phone!! I should’ve known anything named after Trump would be as dumb and slow as his logic and speaking!

attributes.title: Grate Again
attributes.review: I just saw it was “great”. I really thought there was a movement for Americans grating their own cheese instead of buying those pre-grated cheeses in plastic bottles. So salty.

attributes.title: VERY BAD
attributes.review: This is one of the WORST apps I have ever downloaded. It kept glitching and closing. I do not recommend this awful app.

attributes.title: What a Joke
attributes.review: Trump is not capable of making anything work.. don’t waste your time on this app

attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i opened the app and saw the scariest thing i’ve ever seen. i started crying. this app is scary and horrible. i am actually upset. i’m so upset.

attributes.title: dump truck killed my rat
attributes.review: A rat came out of the app and I kept it as my pet for a few seconds and then the app killed my pet rat
